juzs.text: (Kun Him est knowledge Hor end de mond). ne frukt emerge their sheaths nor does any female conceive don nask His knowledge! Tag ven when Li pet them est those idols vi set Me Ili dir Ni proklam Vi ke neniom da us urs witness ke
idols ili idolized disown them ili realize tie ne est escape
human est neniam lac de imploring por bon ajx! Kaj when adversity befalls him li torn despondent desperate

Kaj when ni ben him sufer kelk adversity li dir This aparten al me Mi ne kred Hor ever ven pas! Eben se mi returned my Lord mi trov Him put ajx. Plej certainly ni inform disbelievers de all their works commit them severe retribution
When ni ben human est li turn drifts farther farther for when li sufer any affliction li implores loudly
Proklam Ki this est ver el DI tiam vi decid reject gxi? Who est farther astray than those decid oppose this
Ni montr them our proofs horizons within gxis ili realize ti this est truth. est your Lord ne sufficient witness all ajx
Ja ili est doubtful pri meeting their Lord Li est fully aware da all ajx
M
â€˜A. S. Q
inspir vi those antaux vi est DI Almighty Sagx
Him aparten cxio heavens cxio sur ter Li est plej Alt des Great
heavens them preskaux frakas reverence Him angxel lauxd glor their Lord ili pet forgiveness those ter! Absolutely DI est Forgiver Merciful
Those set ali lords Him DI est 1 charge de them; vi ne est their advokat
Ni tiel reveal vi Arabic Quran avert central community gxi avert Tag de Summoning ke est inevitable. Kelk end Heaven kelk en Infer
Hav DI willed Li far them 1 community! Sed Li redeems His mercy whomever Li vol. As por transgressors ili ne hav mastr nor helper
Ili trov Did ali lords Him? DI est NUR Lord Mastr Li est Unu resurrects dead Li est Omnipotent
Vi disput any part de this message judgment por doing this ripoz DI! Such est DI my Lord En Him mi fid Him mi submit
Initiator de heavens ter. Li kre vi el yourselves spouses - Kaj ankaux por best. Li tiel proviz vi means multiply tie est nothing ke egal Him. Li est Hearer Seer
Al Him aparten absolut control de heavens ter! Li est Unu increases provision whomever Li vol redukt gxi. Li est fully aware da all ajx

Li dekret vi sam religi dekret Noah ki ni inspir vi ki ni dekret Abraham Moses Jesus Vi uphold this 1 religi ne divid gxi idol worshipers mult resent ki vi invit them do DI redeems Himself whomever LI VOL; LI DIREKT Himself NUR those totally submit

Ironically ili romp sects nur post knowledge ven them due al jealousy resentment themselves. Gxi est por predetermined decision el your Lord respite them fora definite interim ili jugx tuj! Ja later generaci hered scripture est plen de dub

This est ki vi predik steadfastly argument ki vi komand do ne sekv their wishes Proklam mi kred en all scriptures send DI! Mi komand jugx vi equitably. DI est our Lord your Lord Ni hav our deeds vi hav your deeds. tie ne est argument us vi. DI testament gather us all together AL Him est ultimate destiny
Those who argue DI post ricev His message their argument nullified their Lord Ili incurred condemnation ind severe retribution
DI EST 1 who SEND scripture liver truth LEGX. all vi kon Hor (Tag Judgment est tre close)
Challenging gxi est those ne kred en gxi. As por those kred ili koncern gxi ili kon ti gxi est truth! Absolutely those deny Hor ir far astray
DI EST fully aware da all His creatures; LI proviz por whomever LI VOL. Li est Powerful Almighty
Whoever streb rekompenc Hereafter ni multiply rekompenc him! whoever streb sxtof this mond ni don him therefrom tiam li ne ricev akci Hereafter
Ili sekv idols dekret them religious legx neniam authorized DI. Se est por predetermined decision ili jugx tuj! Ja transgressors incurred painful retribution
Vi seg transgressors worried cxio ili committed cxio ven haunt them! As por those kred plumb righteous life ili est gxarden Paradise! Ili ricev whatever ili wish their Lord This est great ben

This est bon news el DI His servants kred plumb righteous life! dir mi ne pet vi any wage Mi pet each da vi sorb zorg da your own relativ. Anyone does righteous work ni multiply his rekompenc gxi. DI est Forgiver Appreciative
Ili dir Li (Rashad) est fabricated mensog DI!? Di willed Li sigel your mens DI erases falsehood affirms truth His vort! Li est fully aware da innermost thoughts
Li est Unu akcept repentance His servants remits pek. Li est fully aware da cxio vi do
Respond Him est those kred plumb righteous life! Li dusx them His blessings. As por disbelievers ili incurred severe retribution
Se DI increased provision His servants ili transgress ter. This est Li send gxi precisely mezur whomever Li vol. Li est fully Cognizant Seer His servants
Li est 1 who send pluv post ili despaired stern His mercy! Li est nur Mastr Praiseworthy
Among His proofs est creation de heavens ter creatures Li stern them. Li est able al summon them when Li vol
Anything mav ke okaz vi est consequence your own deeds Li overlooks many (da your pek)
Vi neniam escape vi hav neniom DI as Lord Mastr
Among His proofs est sxip vel mar vel flag
Se Li willed Li ankoraux vent las them motionless sur top da akv. These est proofs those est steadfast appreciative
Li annihilate them consequence their own works Instead Li overlooks many (da their pek)
Those who argue our proofs do gxi trov out ti ili ne hav basis
Whatever vi don est ne plur than temporary sxtof this life. Ki DI posed est far put everlasting those kred fid their Lord
Ili evit gross pek vice kaj when angered ili forgive
Ili respond their Lord per observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat)! Their afer decid due consultation themselves kaj our provisions them ili don charity
When gross injustice befalls them ili bud their dekstr
Just requital injustice est ekvivalent retribution those who pardon argument righteousness rekompenc DI! Li ne am des unjust
Certainly those bud their dekstr when injustice befalls them ne committing any error
wrong unu est those trakt popol unjustly resort al aggression provocation! These incurred painful retribution
Resorting pacienc forgiveness reflects prav strength karakter
Whomever DI send astray neniam trov vol any ali lord vi seg such transgressors when ili seg retribution dir ni get another sxanc
Vi seg them vizagx gxi humiliated debased rigard pen evit rigard! Those kred proklam efektiv losers est those perd their anim their famili Tag Resurrection. transgressors ind everlasting retribution
tie ne est allies help them DI! Whomever DI send astray neniam direkt
Vi respond your Lord tag ven which dekret inevitable DI! tie ne est rifugx vi ke tag nor advokat

Ili turn ni ne send vi their guardian Your pland misi liver message When ni dusx human beings kun mercy, ili igx fier when adversity aflikt them consequence their own deeds human beings turn into disbelievers
Al DI aparten sovereignty de heavens ter! Li kre whatever Li vol granting daughters al whomever Li vol granting fil whomever Li vol
Li hav vir females marry each ali tiam render whomever Li vol sterile Li est Omniscient Omnipotent
Ne human est komunik DI escept inspiration behind barrier send messenger tra Li reveals ki Li vol. Li est plej Alt Sagx
Tiel ni inspir vi revelation proklam our commandments! Vi ne hav ide scripture faith. Ni far this beacon direkt whomever ni choose our servants. Surely vi direkt rekt path
path DI al whom aparten cxio heavens cxio ter. Absolutely all materi controlled DI
M
Kaj enlightening scripture
Ni rendered gxi Arabic Quran vi kompren
Gxi konfit us en original mastr honorable plen de wisdom
Ni just ignor vi transgressed lim
Ni send many prophet previous generaci
Cxiu temp prophet ir them ili ridiculed him
Consequently ni annihilated popol est eben powerful than these. Ni do set ekzempl el previous communities
Vi pet them Who kre heavens ter ili dir Almighty Omniscient kre them
Li est Unu far ter habitable vi kre por vi roads therein ke vi sekv des tuj voj
Li est Unu send down cxiel akv exact mezur revive dead land therewith! Similarly vi resurrected
Li est Unu kre all kinds en par (vir female kaj Li kre vi sxip livestock rajd)
As vi ripoz them vi sxat such ben your Lord dir Glory est Unu subdued this us! Ni ne controlled them ourselves
Ni ultimately return our Lord
Ili ecx asign por Him akci el His own creation! Surely human est est profoundly unappreciative
Li chosen el His creations daughters Himself while ben vi fil
When unu de them don news (de daughter) as ili pretend plej Gracious his vizagx darkened mizer anger
(Ili dir) Ki bon offspring est brought est bel help en ne milit
Ili pretend ke angxel est servants plej Gracious est females! Ili witnessed their creation? Their pretend recorded ili pet
Ili ecx dir plej Gracious willed ni ne worshipped them. Ili ne hav basis such pretend; ili nur konjekt
Ni don them libr this ili upholding gxi
Fakt est ti ili dir Ni trov our parents port nepr practices ni sekv en their footsteps
Invariably when ni send warner any community estr ke community dir Ni trov our parents sekv nepr practices ni ad en their footsteps
(messenger) dir Ki mi brought vi bon guidance than ki vi hered your parents Ili dir Ni est disbelievers message vi brought
Consequently ni requited them. Not consequences rejectors
Abraham dir al his patr his popol mi disown ki vi worship
Nur Unu iniciat me direkt me
This ekzempl (de Abraham) rendered everlasting lecion subsequent generaci; perhaps ili redeem their anim
Ja mi don these popol their ancestors sufficient sxanc tiam truth ven them clarifying messenger
When truth ven them ili dir This est magic ni est disbelievers therein
Ili dir nur this Quran send down another hom 2 communities (Mecca Yathrib) est prominent

Ili unu est asign your Lord's mercy? Ni asign their akci en this life raising kelk da them super others en rang en ord let them dejxor 1 another mercy el your Lord est far put than any sxtof ili hoard
Se ne est all popol igx 1 disbelieving congregation ni granted everyone disbelieves plej Gracious mansions argxent tegment stairs which ili grimp
Their mansions hav impressive gates luxurious furnishings
Ankaux many ornaments All these est temporary sxtof this lowly life. Hereafter - Je your Lord - Est far put por des righteous
Anyone disregards message de plej Gracious ni appoint diabl est his konstant companion
Such companions divert them path far them kred ili direkt
When li ven antaux us li dir Oh Mi wish vi est as far me as 2 orient. Ki miserable companion
Gxi ne konsol vi ke tag transgressors ke ambaux vi akci retribution
Vi far surd auxd; vi far blind vid those est far astray
Ni let vi mort gxi ne ni surely requite them
Ni montr vi (retribution) ni promes them. Ni est plen control them
Vi steadfastly predik ki revealed vi; vi est dekstr path
This est message vi your popol; all da vi questioned
Cxek messengers ni send antaux vi Hav ni ever appointed any ali di! - beside plej Gracious - Al worshipped
Por ekzempl, ni send Moses our proofs Pharaoh li elders proklam mi est messenger Lord univers
When li montr them our proofs ili rid them
Cxiu sign ni montr them est grand than 1 antaux gxi. Ni aflikt them pest perhaps ili pent
(Ili dir O vi magician implore your Lord our behalf relieve this pest) ekde vi hav agreement Him; ni tiam direkt
Sed as baldaux as ni relieved their affliction ili reverted
Pharaoh anonc al his popol O my popol mi ne posed kingship Egypt these flu river aparten al me Vi ne seg
Which unu est put; me ke 1 lowly can est hardly parol
Kiel ven li ne posed trezor or; kiel ven angxel ne akompan him
Li tiel mistifik his popol ili obe him; ili est wicked popol
When ili persist en opposing us ni pun them dron them all
Ni rendered them precedent ekzempl others
When fil Mary cited ekzempl your popol disregarded gxi
Ili dir Est gxi bon worship our di worship him? Ili dir this nur argue vi! Ja ili est popol who joined opposition
Li est ne plur than servant ni ben ni send him as ekzempl Infan Israel
Ni willed ni far vi angxel colonize reproduce ter
Li est serv marker por kon end mond tial vi ne long haven any dub gxi! Vi sekv Me this est dekstr path
Let ne diabl repel vi; li est your ardent enemy
When Jesus ir proofs li dir mi bring vi wisdom clarify kelk da materi en which vi disput. Vi reverence DI obe me
DI est my Lord your Lord VI worship Him SOL! This est dekstr path
opponents disput themselves. Ve al those transgress retribution painful tag
Ili waiting Hor (Tag Judgment ven them suddenly when ili malpli expect gxi)
close amik ke tag igx enemies de 1 another escept por des righteous
O My servants vi ne hav tim tag nor vol vi grieve
Ili est unu kred en our revelations est submitters
Enter Paradise together your spouses gxoj
Ofert them est golden plet tas ili trov cxio kor dezir okul wish por! Vi viv therein forever
Such est Paradise ke vi hered dors your works
Vi hav gxi all kinds da frukt el which vi mangx
Surely kulp vol abide retribution Gehenna forever
Neniam vol retribution commuted them; ili confined therein
Ne est us wronged them; est ili wronged their own anim
Ili implore O Maalek let your Lord fin us Li dir Vi rest forever
Ni don vi truth plej de vi hate truth
Ili schemed kelk scheme Ni tro scheming
Ili opini ni ne auxd their sekret conspiracies? jes ja; our messengers est them recording
Proklam plej Gracious did hav fil mi ankoraux est foremost worshiper
Li glor; Li est Lord de heavens ter Lord great dominion far super their pretend
Let them blunder lud gxis ili meet their tag awaiting them
Li est nur Unu est deity heaven deity ter. Li est plej Sagx Omniscient
(Exalted est Unu posed all sovereignty de heavens ter cxio them! Kun Him est knowledge Hor end de mond) Him vi returned
Neniom da those ili idolize Him posed any potenc intercede their intercession coincides kun truth ili fully kon
Vi pet them kre them ili dir DI. would tiam ili deviate
Gxi proklam O my Lord these popol ne kred
Vi disregard them dir Pac; ili do gxi surely trov out
M
this enlightening scripture
Ni send gxi down ben nokt ni est avert
En gxi (scripture) cxiu materi wisdom clarified
Gxi predetermined ordon el us ke ni send messengers
This est mercy your Lord Li est Hearer Omniscient
Lord de heavens ter cxio them. Se nur vi est nepr
tie ne est ali di Him. Li controls life death; your Lord Lord your ancestors
Ja ili est doubtful heedless
Do watch tag when cxiel brings profound fum
Gxi kovert popol; this est painful retribution
Our Lord relieve this retribution us; ni est believers
Nun ke gxi est tro late ili memor! enlightening messenger ven them
Ili torn him dir Put kler crazy
Ni relieve retribution awhile; vi baldaux revert
Tag ni strik grand stroke ni vengx
Ni tested them popol Pharaoh; honorable messenger ir them
Proklam Auxskult al me servants DI! Mi est honest messenger vi
Kaj ne transgress DI. Mi bring vi powerful proofs
Mi streb rifugx my Lord your Lord vi oppose me
Vi ne wish kred tiam simply las me
Subsequently li implored his Lord These est wicked popol
(Di dir) Vojagx My servants nokt; vi pursued
Kruc mar quickly; their trup dron
Tiel ili las many gxarden printemp
Crops luxurious life
Blessings ili gxu
All these ni kauxz hered ali popol
Nek heaven nor ter plor them ili ne respited
Meanwhile ni sav Infan Israel humiliating persecution
El Pharaoh; li est tiran
Ni chosen them all popol knowingly
Ni montr them many proofs which constituted great test
Prezent generaci dir
Ni nur mort 1 death; ni neniam resurrected
Bring dors our forefathers se vi est truthful
Ili est put than popol de Tubba others them? Ni annihilated them their krim
Ni ne kre heavens ter cxio them just lud
Ni kre them specif purpose plej de them ne kon
Tag Decision awaits them all
Ke est tag when ne amik help his amik en any voj ne 1 help
Nur those ating mercy DI. Li est Almighty Merciful
Surely arb de bitterness
Proviz food por des sinful
Like lye gxi bol stomak
Like bol hellish drink
sorb him jxet him into centr Infer
Tiam versx upon his kap retribution Inferno
Gust this; vi est tial powerful tial honorable
This est ki vi uz dub
righteous vol est secure pozici
Gxu gxarden printemp
Wearing velur satin proksim each ali
Ni grant them wonderful spouses
Ili gxu gxi all kinds da frukt perfekt pac
Ili ne gust death therein - beyond 1 death - Li sxpar them retribution Infer
Such est ben your Lord Such est great triumf
Ni tiel clarified gxi your idiom ke ili pren heed
Do wait ili tro wait
M
revelation this scripture est DI Almighty Sagx
heavens ter est plen de proofs believers
Ankaux en your creation creation all best tie est proofs popol est nepr
Ankaux alternation de nokt tag provisions ti DI send down cxiel revive dead land manipulation vent; all these est proofs popol kompren
These est di revelations ni recite vi truthfully. En which Hadith DI His revelations ili kred
Ve al cxiu fabricator kulp
auxd di revelations recited him tiam insist arrogantly sur his voj as li neniam auxd them! Promes him painful retribution
When li lern anything our revelations li mok them. These incurred shameful retribution
Awaiting them est Gehenna. Their earnings ne help them nor idols ili set DI. Ili incurred terrible retribution
This est beacon those disbelieve these revelations their Lord incurred condemnation painful retribution
DI est UNU committed mar your service tial ke SXIP roam GXI en accordance kun His LEGX. Vi tiel streb His provisions ti vi est appreciative
Li committed en your service cxio heavens ter; all el Him! These est proofs popol reflect
Tell those kred forgive those ne expect tag DI! Li fully pag everyone whatever ili earned
Whoever works righteousness does por his own bon whoever works evil does tial his own detriment! Al your Lord vi returned
Ni don Infan de Israel scripture wisdom prophethood proviz them bon provisions ni bestowed them plur blessings than any ali popol
Ni don them herein klar commandments. Ironically ili ne disput this knowledge ven them. This est jealousy their part. Surely your Lord jugx them Tag Resurrection cxio ili disput
Ni tiam appointed vi establ gxust legx; vi sekv this ne sekv wishes de those ne kon
Ili ne help vi je all DI. est transgressors ally 1 another while DI est Lord de des righteous
This proviz enlightenments popol guidance mercy those est nepr
those work evil expect ni trakt them sam manier as those kred plumb righteous life? Can their life their death est des sam Wrong ja est their judgment
DI KRE heavens TER SPECIF purpose en ord pag each ANIM whatever gxi earned MALPLEJ injustice
Vi not unu di hav est his ego? Consequently DI send him astray his knowledge sigel his auxd his mens met vual his okul! Who tiam direkt him such decision DI? Vi ne pren heed
Ili dir Ni nur viv this life; ni viv mort nur temp kauxz our death! Ili ne hav sure knowledge this; ili nur konjekt
When our revelations recited them clearly their nur argument est dir Bring dors our forefathers vi est truthful
Dir DI granted vi life tiam Li puts vi death tiam Li summon vi Tag Resurrection est inevitable! Plej popol ne kon
Al DI aparten all sovereignty de heavens ter! Tag Hor Judgment ven pas ke est when falsifiers perd
Vi seg cxiu community kneeling Cxiu community est vok view their record Hodiaux vi get pag por cxio vi done
This est our record gxi utters truth vi! Ni recording cxio vi did
As por those kred work righteousness their Lord admit them His mercy! This est great triumf
As por those disbelieve My revelations Est recited vi vi torn arrogant est wicked popol
When gxi proklam di promes est truth ke Hor Judgment inevitable vi dir Ni ne kon ki Hor est Ni est plen de konjekt gxi; ni ne est nepr
evils their works igx evident al them tre ajx ili mok ven haunt them
Gxi proklam Hodiaux ni forges vi just as vi forges meeting this tag. Your abode est hellfire vi ne hav helpers
This est vi sorb di revelations en vain preoccupied 1 life. Consequently ili neniam exit therefrom nor vol ili pretekst
Al DI aparten all lauxd; Lord heavens Lord ter Lord univers
Al Him aparten all supremacy heavens ter! Li est Almighty Sagx
